mapper.sql: member_idx, member_error, member_pass_hint, member_name, member_nick, member_email, member_email_use, member_sms_use, member_birth, member_gender, member_address, member_home_phone, member_cell_phone, member_wallet, member_auth_status, member_auto_pay, member_auto_pay_list, member_id, reg_date, pass, member_krw, member_btc
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from TA_MEMBER
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into TA_MEMBER (member_idx, member_error, member_pass_hint, member_name, member_nick, member_email, member_email_use, member_sms_use, member_birth, member_gender, member_address, member_home_phone, member_cell_phone, member_wallet, member_auth_status, member_auto_pay, member_auto_pay_list, member_id, reg_date, pass, member_krw, member_btc) values (#{memberIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberError,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberPassHint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberEmailUse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberSmsUse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberBirth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberGender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberHomePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberCellPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberWallet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberAuthStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberAutoPay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberAutoPayList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberKrw,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberBtc,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update TA_MEMBER
member_idx = #{record.memberIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_error = #{record.memberError,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_pass_hint = #{record.memberPassHint,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update TA_MEMBER
member_error = #{memberError,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_pass_hint = #{memberPassHint,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_name = #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_nick = #{memberNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

member_cell_phone = #{memberCellPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update TA_MEMBER set member_error = #{memberError,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_pass_hint = #{memberPassHint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_name = #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_nick = #{memberNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_email = #{memberEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_email_use = #{memberEmailUse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_sms_use = #{memberSmsUse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_birth = #{memberBirth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_gender = #{memberGender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_address = #{memberAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_home_phone = #{memberHomePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_cell_phone = #{memberCellPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_wallet = #{memberWallet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_auth_status = #{memberAuthStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_auto_pay = #{memberAutoPay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_auto_pay_list = #{memberAutoPayList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reg_date = #{regDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pass = #{pass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_krw = #{memberKrw,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_btc = #{memberBtc,jdbcType=INTEGER} where member_idx = #{memberIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from TA_MEMBER order by member_idx desc limit #{page}, 10

select * from TA_MEMBER where
reg_date between "${startDate} 00:00:00" and "${endDate} 23:59:59"
and
( member_id like "%${searchWord}%" or member_name like "%${searchWord}%" or member_email like "%${searchWord}%" )
order by member_idx desc limit #{page}, 10

select count(*) from TA_MEMBER
where reg_date between "${startDate} 00:00:00" and "${endDate} 23:59:59"
and
( member_id like "%${searchWord}%" or member_name like "%${searchWord}%" or member_email like "%${searchWord}%" )
order by member_idx desc
